title: How to improve my rapping and make a Korean entertainment company pick me and believe that I am unique? What are the best rap songs to audition with - Quora

response.answer_text: To improve your rapping you must pick any song you like (I would recommend a slow one, since you are just starting), pick a lyric video and put it on the slowest playback speed possible (0.5x, rather than 0.25x). Start rapping over it, to get the hang of it, and when you do, increase the speed. Do this repeatedly until you get to normal speed, and then take an instrumental (or karaoke version) and rap.  When you have mastered the instrumental, take it away and do it without background music, since you will have to send and audio or video of just your rapping. Record yourself so you can see your mistakes. It is really important that you see your own mistakes, so your audition will be as best as possible. If you can, show it to your family or friends with a comparison to the original song, they will tell you where you can improve (it’s better if at least someone knows about music) Then, once you’ve sent it, the company will only think you’re unique, if you are truly unique. You must have talent, and a lot of charisma, they must see passion in your videos and your audios, they have to see that you truly want this. Fighting!
Picking a song for your audition it's something that comes from your heart. You know that song is right for you? Pick it❣💙🤗
